description: Bringing the Aloha spirit to the metro DC area in our tricked out woody truck - grilled Hawaiian teriyaki's - plate lunches, salads & sandwichesHula Girl Truck DC will serves around the city weekly and work in some late night stops as we get rollling.Authentic grilled Teriyaki steak, chicken and tofu served on a crisp Asian Salad or in a Bon Mi style sandwich or go totally local with a plate lunch – two scoops of rice and one scoop mac salad!! We also serve edamame tossed in Hawaiian sea salt and spam musubi (spam sushi)…and for a truly fun taste of Hawaii – we have toasted coconut soft serve, dipped in dark chocolate and rolled in macadamia nuts….a Hawaiian Nutty Buddy!! Our truck is decked out like a 1960’s woody – complete with a flat screen TV showing vintage surf films, old school Hawaii 5-0, Elvis in Hawaii and Magnum P.I.! We are about having fun and bringing the Aloha Spirit to DC.
name: Hula Girl Truck
